def smc::smceval (   filestubs = '*',
  boxdata = 0.8,
  fragmaster = False 
)

Make pdf-boxplots from testfiles.

Parameters:
filename Name of the testfile to be processed.
boxdata Percentage of data to be included in the core of the boxplot.

def smc::smctest (   targetDistr,
  filestub,
  runs,
  nbridge,
  nparticles,
  kappa,
  test,
  plot,
  verbose 
)

Run repeated tests of bridge smc.

Parameters:
targetDistr The target distribution.
filestub Name of the test-file without numbering.
runs Number of testruns to perform.
nbridge Number of bridge steps between the prior and the target.
nparticles Number of particles.
kappa Prior smoothing parameter: 0 <= kappa <= 1.
test True, if no testfile is desired.
plot True, if the steps are to be plotted.
verbose True, if reports to standard are desired.
